mapper.select: SELECT /* */ REG_DATE AS regDate /* */ , TELEMSG_NO AS telemsgNo /* */ , PRTSACNUT_NO AS prtsacnutNo /* */ , VIRTL_ACNUT_NO AS virtlAcnutNo /* */ , TAXT_TY AS taxtTy /* */ , BSNM_INFO AS bsnmInfo /* */ , INSTT_NM AS insttNm /* */ , INSTT_RPRSNTV_NM AS insttRprsntvNm /* */ , RSPNS_CODE AS rspnsCode /* */ , RSPNS_MSSAGE AS rspnsMssage /* */ , SEND_YN AS sendYn /* */ FROM T0300300 WHERE 1=1 AND REG_DATE = #{regDate} AND SEND_YN = #{sendYn}
